description: A happily married father of two, who hates TV, brings a wedding anniversary gift for his wife, with the desire of a romantic interlude. Nonetheless, daily life chaos ensues, leading to TV screens being kicked in and everybody being angry.

Title: 353. Didi
description: Gopal's sister believes that she knows what is best for him. But a series of events causes turbulence in the family.

Title: 354. Dokuritsu gurentai
description: When Sergeant Okubo's brother is murdered at a Japanese outpost in Northern China during the Second World War, Okubo poses as a war correspondent and seeks out his brother's killer. The command is wiped out by Chinese forces and Okubo escapes and joins a tribe of bandits.

Title: 355. Double Agents
description: (1959) Robert Hossein, Marina Vlady, Robert Le Beal. A brilliant "little" spy film. Hossein and Vlady play mysterious characters who meet up one night in a lonely cabin in the wilds of Normandy. They are both spies, but whom do they work for-the Allies or the Nazis. Vlady is a real stunner. A stylish, underrated film. From 16mm.

Title: 356. The Buddenbrooks
description: First part of two of the saga of the troubled Buddenbrook family and their business in mid-19th-century Germany.

Title: 357. The Tiger Attacks
description: Paul Lamiani, a former spy now managing a restaurant, has to take on duties again on a gangster's affair involving his best friend.

Title: 358. The Navy Lark
description: Film version of a popular BBC radio show about the incompetent crew of a Royal Navy ship.

Title: 359. Web of Evidence
description: A British-American returns to Britain after 20 years to discover that his father has been jailed since WW2 for a murder that took place in murky circumstances.

Title: 360. Satta Bazaar
description: Widower Ramesh lives a comfortable lifestyle with his daughter, Kala, but is advised to re-marry so that Kala can get the love and caring of a mother, so he re-marries Jamuna. But Kala hates Jamuna and will not even call her "Maa", but Jamuna continues to strive to care and love her as her own, despite of giving birth to a baby boy. Years pass by, Kala has now grown up, is in love with Ramesh's business partner, Bholanath's son, Shyam, who are of a different caste. Ramesh disapproves, but Jamuna convinces him otherwise, and the couple get formerly engaged. After the engagement, Ramesh gets to meet multi-millionaire Badriprasad, who accumulated wealth through the stock exchange. Ramesh takes a interest and invests heavily, he does win some money, but his luck soon changes when he loses everything. He is on the verge of bankruptcy, and the only man who can save him now is Badriprasad on one condition - that Kala must marry his son, Pritam. Will Ramesh agree to this trade, and break Kala's heart and her engagement with Shyam?

Title: 362. The Last Mile
description: A prison break is attempted the same night an execution occurs on death row.

Title: 363. European Nights
description: A tour of the nightlife in Rome, Paris, London, Madrid, Vienna, Brussels and more. Episodes presenting famous artists and people performing.

Title: 364. Ferry to Hong Kong
description: Mark Conrad, a habitual drunk and troublemaker with a shady past, is expelled by Hong Kong police after one too many bar fights. He's sent to Macao on the Fa Tsan, a ferry owned by Captain Hart. Conrad's papers are out of order and Macao refuses him entry. Unable to go ashore, Conrad is a permanent passenger on the ferry with Hart, who detests him. It's all one long, lazy voyage for Conrad until one fateful trip when an encounter with a typhoon and pirates forces Conrad to choose between an aimless drifter's life and becoming a man again.

Title: 365. Far til fire p√• Bornholm
description: A family vacations on the small Danish island of Bornholm. Little Per meets a new friend, Torben, while S√∏s and Mie manage to destroy a movie production.

Title: 366. Rider in Blue
description: When private eye John Hillman is on assignment in London his wife Kajsa visits the Army's riding school at Str√∂msholm, Sweden. She gets involved in the strange murder of the Blue Rider. Unknown to everyone at Str√∂msholm.

Title: 367. Roadracers
description: The father of a race-car driver blames him for a death on the track, disowns him, and sponsors a rival racer.

Title: 369. Oh! Qu√© mambo
description: Miguel Montero foils a bank robbery and finds success as a night club singer, but doesn't know his wife is being courted by an Italian fitness instructor.

Title: 370. Make Mine a Double
description: A WWII British secret agent has a desperate mission in occupied France. An airman who is his double is enlisted in the scheme with the intention of confusing the enemy, but everyone gets confused.

Title: 371. Bouboulina
description: Captain Lascarina decides to organize the revolution in Spetses despite her double widowhood. In the struggle for the liberation of Greece, she gives all her property, fighting along with her lads.

Title: 372. Attack of the Moors
description: Trouble erupts on the border between Spain and France when the future Heir to the throne is captured and held hostage. Many groups try to take control of the situation erupting in many battles. Larry Anderson

Title: 373. Jeca Tatu
description: Jeca Tatu is a lazy, simple-minded guy who has his property threatened by the greed of a landowner.

Title: 374. Plan 9 from Outer Space in Color
description: Aliens from outer space reanimate the Earth's dead in an attempt to save the human race. Restored and In Color.

Title: 375. Serengeti
description: The borders of the Serengeti National Park in Tanzania were initially drawn without considering the herds of grass-eating wild animals. The recording of seasonal animal movements by the film team at the end of the 1950s forms the framework for action, so that based on this work, new boundaries of the park could be determined in such a way, that the most important animal populations are protected all year round. The beauty of the savannah landscape and the sideways glance at numerous wild animal species living there, some of which were presented to a broader audience for the first time in this film, fill this nature documentary.

Title: 376. Uomini e nobiluomini
description: Nicola Peccoli has always nurtured his niece Giovanna, an orphan since the age of two and now of age, but he does not look favorably on her beloved Mario because he is just a simple employee and a lower class of society.

Title: 377. ...and the Wild Wild Women
description: A harsh study about the grim realities of life in a female prison environment. The story concerns a young girl sent to prison who experiences the entire prison subculture. The inmates she befriends vary from tough dangerous dames to smaller submissive women who are totally lost in prison life.

Title: 378. Tot√≤, Eva e il pennello proibito
description: When swindler La Spada and his accomplice Jos√© are released from jail in Madrid, they decide to pull a really great swindle: nothing less than to discover and sell a third picture of Goya's "Maya in Camison" (Maya in a nightgown). They engage the renowned Scorcelletti who lives in Rome and can forge any artwork. Afterwards, with help from the beautiful Eva, they convince celebrated art critic Francisco Montiel of the existence of a third Maya and let him find the picture. When the swindlers are at the point of selling the fake to an American millionaire, Scorcelli returns from Rome to sell one of his six other maya pictures.

Title: 379. Hidden Homicide
description: A man wakes up in a strange location with a gun in his hand and a dead body, not knowing how the whole thing happened. He doesn't remember anything about the whole scenario.

Title: 380. Hey Boy! Hey Girl!
description: In Las Vegas, as band leader Louis Prima auditions female vocalists, Father Burton and parishioner Dorothy Spencer come to ask him to perform at their local church bazaar to raise money for a summer camp program. After Prima's manager, Marty Moran, brusquely informs them that Prima is busy on the day of the bazaar, Dorothy, angry at getting the "brush off," confronts Prima with her request. When Marty rudely dismisses her once again, Dorothy waits in the lobby for the audition to end. After having run through a disappointing roster of singers, Prima apologizes to Dorothy for Marty's behavior and agrees to entertain at the bazaar. Bolstered by Prima's appearance, the bazaar raises over $3,000 for the summer camp. In gratitude, Dorothy invites Prima to dinner, during which she introduces him to her devoted young brother Buzz. When a neighbor drops by to ask Dorothy to babysit, Dorothy sings the infant to sleep, impressing Prima with her sweet voice. While washing the dishes, Dorothy hums a tune, prompting Prima to offer her the vocalist job, but she refuses. The next day, when Dorothy goes to the theater to ask Prima to join the church fund-raising committee, Marty insists that she sing before Prima gives her his answer. When Prima begins to coach Dorothy during her audition, the band breaks into laughter and Prima realizes that they have created an irresistible comedy routine. As Dorothy achieves prominence with the band, Buzz begins to feel neglected. One night, Buzz sees Prima kiss Dorothy and reacts with a jealous tantrum. Consequently, when Prima proposes to Dorothy, she turns him down and announces that she is leaving the group to spend more time with Buzz. When Prima asks Father Burton for advice, the priest suggests that he try to make friends with Buzz by taking him on a hike. After Prima enlists the band to join them, Buzz begins to reconsider his opinion of Prima. As they hike up the mountain trail to an old resort, they discover that a fence has been erected to block their path. When Buzz wistfully gazes past the fence and describes the pond and other facilities at the resort, Prima decides to lease the land and turn it into a year-round camp for the children. Through a series of fund raisers, Prima and the others raise the $30,000 needed to lease the resort, and after they exceed their goal, Dorothy finally accepts Prima's proposal.

Title: 381. Struggle on the Nile
description: When Mihassab and Migahed plan to buy a new barge for their village, the leader of a group of thieves sends his men to steal the money. He also sends Nargis, a carnival dancer, to cause a strife between the two men.

Title: 382. The Bandit of Zhobe
description: In India, the 19th century, the rebellious Kasim Khan fought the English.

Title: 383. Paigham
description: Two brothers, Ram and Ratan, find themselves at odds with each other as the former supports the mill owner, Sewakram, while the latter forms a union to protest against him.

Title: 384. Nat√ºrlich die Autofahrer
description: Eberhard Dobermann is a widower and a policeman who loves to control the roads and let people pay fines. Even with his neighbour and friend Jutta Schmalbach he has no pity. Thus he cannot understand why his daughter Karin just falls in love with a racing pilot called Walter. But it gets even worse when Eberhard wins a VW-Kaefer at the annual police party. So he has to learn to drive and thus even brings his teacher close to a heart attack.

Title: 385. Marie of the Isles
description: In 1635, Jacques du Parquet, the nephew of the well known explorer Belain d'Esnambic, enters a tavern in Dieppe, and falls in love with the daughter of the bartender, Marie Bonnard. He knows his noble family would disaprove such a marriage; besides, he is nominated for the post of governor in Martinica. He promised never to forget Marie, but as time goes by, she will accept to marry a rich and unscrupulous man, Monsieur de Saint-Andr√©. When her husband is appointed to serve in Martinica as General Commissioner, Marie demands to go with him. At her arrival, all sorts of trouble arrive: pirates take action against travellers and goods, rotten deals set the two officers against each other, and finally jealousy settles to make things worse.

Title: 386. Five Gates to Hell
description: A small group of Red Cross doctors and nurses are held captive by Chinese guerrillas in Vietnam.

Title: 387. The Bloody Brood
description: Two beatniks get their kicks by dealing drugs and violence.

Title: 388. Gangster Boss
description: In Paris, scoundrel mates Paolo and Antoine Venturen hope to get rich quick by asking ransom fro rich Mr. Jumelin's preteen son Eric. Masquerading as Indians, the scamp's favorite game, does the trick. They soon learn such bratty rascal is more trouble then he's worth. The boy's a P.I. instead of paying, and it gets worse.

Title: 389. Cerasella
description: Two people struggle between marriage for love instead of marriage of convenience.

Title: 390. Kr√°l Sumavy
description: A communist film about Czech border guards in the late 1940s and their struggle against smugglers and refugees.

Title: 391. My Little Seamstress
description: Aurora is a modest young girl, working as dressmaker for the women her popular district, near the OPorto cathedral. One day, through a hintz-dress design competition, she gets involved with a haut couture atelier.

Title: 392. Bir Qalanin Sirri
description: The struggle of the people against the shakh (king) who seized all of land and water resources.

Title: 393. Maruja
description: In a small rural town, everybody lays eyes on Maruja, the most beautiful woman there. After the son of the mayor comes back from France, he also notices Maruja, setting forth events of love, jealousy, guilt, and anger.

Title: 394. Three Stooges Fun-O-Rama
description: Columbia Pictures feature program of 4 unedited Three Stooges shorts, that feature Joe Besser, and were originally released between 1957-1959.

Title: 395. Broth of a Boy
description: A British TV producer is traveling in Ireland when he comes across a village where they are planning a birthday party for the oldest man in the world. He decides he wants to make a film about this man, but Patrick Farrell is not the delightful old man one would hope him to be. And he is not enthusiastic about making a big deal of his upcoming birthday either.

Title: 396. Head of a Tyrant
description: A beautiful girl plans to seduce, then murder, the brutal conqueror who has taken over her city.

Title: 397. As the Sea Rages
description: After five years of war, Clements, a professional seaman, has no ambitions other than to live in peace and carry out his activity. Having settled down in the archipelago of the Aegean Sea, he has founded a small sponge fishing company in an idyllic place and foresees an optimistic future. Unfortunately, he soon finds himself caught in a crossfire...

Title: 398. Tommy the Toreador
description: Tommy, a cheerful sailor who travels singing, gets confused for a famous bullfighter in Spain. He ends up in the arena facing an angry bull while spectators cheer.

Title: 399. M√©xico nunca duerme
description: An old woman searches for her teenage granddaughter all through the nightclubs of Mexico City.

Title: 400. The Redeemer
description: The Passion of Jesus starting with His arrest and trial that was shot near Madrid and features narration by Sebastion Cabot. Jesus' face is never seen but in the English version he is voiced by veteran Hollywood actor Macdonald Carey.

Title: 401. Genghis Khan and His Mongols
description: An imperial agent stops a riot in a province.

Title: 403. Pervyy paren
description: Watch the Soviet youth living in the country as they labour, exercize, sing, dance, have fun and fall in love during which they may well be the best years of their lives.

Title: 404. Archim√®de, le clochard
description: Bum Archimede wants to spend the winter in prison, but to get there proves not to be that easy.

Title: 405. Tenemos 18 a√±os
description: Comedy about the surreal holiday of two teenage Spanish girls, where they meet a bizarre assortment of villains and new friends.

Title: 406. Little Rascals Varieties
description: A compilation feature-film made up of four 'Our Gang" shorts from the 1930s. The shorts used in this 1959 feature release were Our Gang Follies of 1936 (1935), The Pinch Singer (1936), Reunion in Rhythm (1937), and Our Gang Follies of 1938 (1937).

Title: 407. Four Desperate Men
description: Three men attempt a prison break, but their plan derails when their boat falters near an island, where the caretaker recognizes the convict. A hostage situation erupts, leading to a tense standoff with authorities.

Title: 408. Season of Passion
description: Two Australian sugarcane cutters spend their annual five-month vacations in Sydney with their mistresses.

Title: 409. Meus Amores no Rio
description: As a prize for winning a TV quiz show, an Argentinean girl gets a ticket to Rio de Janeiro, where she stays for one week. During this time, she meets three suitors, and her heart has to choose one of them.

Title: 410. Counterplot
description: Man hides out in Puerto Rico from the police and his double-crossing attorney.

Title: 411. Goonj Uthi Shehnai
description: Childhood sweethearts Gopi and Kishen hope to get married when they are grown up. Gopi dances to the magical tunes of Kishen's clarinet (shenai), and both are virtually inseparable. Years pass by, both have grown up and Gopi's mom, Jamuna, would like Gopi to get married to a young man from Lucknow, by the name of Shekhar, who works for All India Radio. Shekhar visits them, meets Gopi, and approves of this marriage, and asks Jamuna to finalize a day for the marriage. When this news reaches Gopi and Kishen both are heartbroken, as much as Kishen would like to marry Gopi he knows that he is unemployed and poor, and hence not considered a good suitor. Additionally, his mentor and guardian, Raghunath, would like him to marry his daughter, Ramkali, and may ask him to make the ultimate sacrifice by demanding this as his guru-dakshina (teacher's fee). Then the villagers ask Kishen to leave the town as he has brought shame on them all by continuing to meet with Gopi, who has now been promised to Shekhar. Kishen leaves town, re-locates to Lucknow, meets with Shekhar, who gives him a job at the Radio Station. Soon Kishen's music reaches every corner of India and he becomes a rich man overnight. He returns home to wed Gopi, but finds out that Shekhar is to wed her, and he is just in time to play the clarinet at their wedding. It looks like Gopi and Kishen's romance is fated to end tragically - unless and until a miracle occurs that will unite them forever.

Title: 412. Seksing-Seksi (Mapang-halina)
description: The MOST Controversial, The MOST Daring and the MOST Talked About picture ever produced in the Philippines.

Title: 413. Jakten
description: Two men attracted to the same woman are attending a trip with her in the Mountains during the bird hunting season. A triangular love drama ending with tragedy. Or is it, really?

Title: 414. The Second Man
description: Esmat Kazem (Rushdy Abaza) runs a smuggling operation between Egypt and Lebanon, using his cabaret in Cairo as a front. Ibrahim, the smuggling ring's operative in Beirut, is murdered over a dispute with Esmat. The police relay the news of the murder to Ibrahim's sister Lamia (Sabah), a former singer at Esmat's cabaret and an old flame of Esmat's.
